body.p: The Spark app assists development teams in building simple, flexible, and reactive applications in the cloud.

Configure the system settings through:
Objects - Manage custom objects registered with Spark.
Marketplace - Upgrade environments, install new packages, or shop and install third party apps.
Rollup Summary Fields - Configure fields to aggregate data from child objects.
Help Resources - Provides users with Spark API documentation and additional resources for staff user support.
API Services - Manage API services, resources, and mappings.
Routing Rules - Control how the system routes logic and processing when changes are made to objects in the database.
Configuration Summary - Reset org configurations and manually run install scripts.
Access Manager - Modify object permissions, Apex class and VisualForce page access, and field permissions using the Spark Toolkit.
